channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Decomposed fox, 29th August
item.description:
The fox was in the bushes dead and something has pulled it out and it’s on the corner of the alley behind 1-23 Arthur Grove just up from he bus stop at Burrage Road Arthur Grove Se187es

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Arthur Grove, Plumstead, London

item.title: 2ft by 1ft with 3 inch drop, 29th August
item.description:
This is on the route to the junction with Glenview and vehicles are running over it and kicking up the loose fragments and making the situation worse. This was installed to hide the drop with subsidence in the concrete slabs making the original road surface.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Amberley Road, West Heath, London

item.title: Flags on lamp posts and street furniture. Not for patriotic reasons but I feel intimidation., 29th August
item.description:
This particular spot is a memorial to a local child killed last year. She was British/Turkish. The flag here feels even more inappropriate than the many others.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London Road, Crayford, London
